data.label: Global Commodity Trading
data.title: Connecting Farmers to Consumers Worldwide
data.description: Iustus Mercatura - Latin for "Just Trade" - delivers essential food commodities with integrity, transparency, and a commitment to sustainable global commerce.
data.subtitle: Just Trade - Ethical Commodity Trading

data.title: Premium Brazilian Commodities
data.description: Sourced ethically, processed meticulously, delivered globally

values.title: Integrity & Transparency
values.description: We commit to fair pricing, ethical sourcing—especially for Brazilian Sugar—and maintaining an open book with all partners. We measure success by the trust we earn, not just by volume.

values.title: Expertise & Excellence
values.description: We rely on deep-rooted market intelligence and world-class logistical management. Our specialised team operates with surgical precision, constantly anticipating and mitigating the inherent volatility of global markets.

values.title: Partnership & Prosperity
values.description: We view every client and producer as a critical part of a shared, sustainable ecosystem, aiming to build long-term relationships that foster growth on all sides. Ethical conduct and market leadership are inseparable.

data.title: Sustainability & Responsibility
data.intro: At Iustus Mercatura, sustainability is not just a goal - it's the foundation of everything we do. We are committed to creating lasting positive impact across our entire supply chain.

cards.title: UN Global Compact
cards.description: We adhere strictly to the United Nations Global Compact principles, ensuring our operations respect human rights, labor standards, and environmental protection.

cards.title: ISO 9001 Certified
cards.description: Our quality management system meets the highest international standards, ensuring consistent excellence and continuous improvement in all operations.

cards.title: Ethical Sourcing
cards.description: We partner only with producers who share our commitment to fair labor practices, environmental stewardship, and community development.

cards.title: Carbon Reduction
cards.description: We're actively working to reduce our carbon footprint through optimized logistics, renewable energy partnerships, and sustainable packaging initiatives.

data.title: The Philosophy of Just Trade
data.leadText: At Iustus Mercatura Holding Inc., founded in 2025, we prioritize integrity, transparency, and long-term partnerships to create lasting value across global markets.
data.description: As a privately-owned, international holding company based in the British Virgin Islands, we are committed to ethical business practices and responsible asset management. Our name, which translates from Latin to 'Just Trade' or 'Righteous Commerce,' reflects our dedication to integrity in all our transactions. We strive to be a centralized hub for a diverse array of international investments and subsidiaries, strictly adhering to UN standards and ISO 9001 quality management principles.

features.title: Ethical Trading
features.description: Fair pricing, transparent transactions, and open book with all partners

features.title: Global Presence
features.description: Operations across South America, USA, Middle East, Asia, and East Africa

features.title: Vertical Integration
features.description: Complete supply chain from field to end customer

data.foundedText: Established on the principles of fair and ethical global trade

data.quote: Under my leadership, the company will drive forward towards vertical integration. This is reflected in our Iustus Agricultura Brasil SA project, the establishment of our own sugar production in Uganda, and the founding of the Iustus Nautic fleet. This not only ensures the sustainability of our supply, but also enables us to offer our customers a comprehensive service—from field to customer.
data.name: Dr. Gerhard Kral

data.tagline: Connecting farmers to consumers to deliver essential food, feed and fuel to the world.

data.name: Dr. Gerhard Kral
data.description: Visionary Chief Executive Officer who established the company's global strategy on the foundational philosophy of 'Just Trade'. Under his direction, the company is driving strategic vertical integration through initiatives like Project Iustus Agricultura Brazil SA and the Uganda Refinery Project 2026.

data.name: LLM Christian Thomas
data.description: Group Chairman and acting Chief Compliance Officer serving as chief steward of the company's vision and ethical mandate 'Just Trade'. He provides long-term strategic guidance and governance overseeing major initiatives including Project Iustus Agricultura Brazil SA and the Uganda Refinery Project 2026.

data.name: Lic. jur. Martin Bohler
data.description: Legal expertise combined with strategic vision. Co-founded the company and drives risk management and corporate governance.

data.name: Andreas Zsifkovits
data.description: CEO of Iustus Mercatura Maritime Logistics UK Limited, leads global shipping and freight operations. He ensures the cost-efficient, reliable movement of commodities, translating the 'Just Trade' mandate into operational excellence.

data.name: Miss Resty Nankya
data.description: CEO of Iustus Mercatura Uganda Limited, leads the dedicated African team with passion. She spearheads the transformative Uganda Refinery Project 2026, driving local value creation and securing long-term regional growth.

data.name: Stephanie Shi
data.description: Leads Asian market strategy and expansion. Deep expertise in cross-cultural business development and regional trade networks.

data.name: Eng. Yong Jiang
data.description: COO of Iustus Mercatura USA Inc., leveraging 30+ years of experience in the Asian commodities market. He ensures operational excellence, establishing resilient Brazil-to-Asia supply chains and upholding the 'Just Trade' mandate.

data.name: Paulo R. de Souza
data.description: COO of Iustus Mercatura Brasil Ltda., strategic leader leveraging 30 years of hands-on expertise in the Brazilian sugar trade. He ensures robust operational control and keeps close contact to local Suppliers and Farmers, strictly following the mantra of ethical, self-sufficient sourcing at the origin.

data.name: Capt. Eng. Patrick Duggie
data.description: COO of Maritime Logistics UK, drives operational excellence. He uses his expertise to guarantee the secure, cost-efficient delivery of global commodities, upholding the 'Just Trade' principles.

data.name: Jimmey S. Shah
data.role: Sales Director Middle East/Asia & CCO FITC Energy
data.description: Sales Director Middle East/Asia (Dubai), drives sales and growth across crucial regional markets. He is also the CCO for FITC Energy Group DXB LLC, leading the company's energy-related business operations.

data.name: Mozafor Rahman
data.description: COO of Iustus Mercatura Bangladesh, leads regional operations and market development in South Asia. Expert in local supply chain management and trade partnerships.

data.name: Marianna Tavares
data.description: External legal counsel providing expert guidance on international trade law, compliance, and corporate governance.

data.name: Brazilian Sugar IC45
data.description: White Refined Sugar IC45 from Brazil – the pinnacle of sweetness! Sourced from Brazil, our sugar is meticulously processed for top quality and purity. Perfect for baking, beverages, or any culinary creation, its fine granules dissolve effortlessly. Experience the unmatched sweetness and clarity of Brazilian IC45.

data.name: Sugar IC600/1200 VHP
data.description: Discover SUGAR IC600/1200 VHP from Brazil—premium quality, high-purity sugar perfect for all your culinary and industrial needs. Enjoy consistent sweetness and exceptional taste in every grain. Ideal for refining operations.

data.name: Yellow Soybeans
data.description: Discover the premium quality of Brazilian Yellow Soybeans! Packed with nutrition, our non-GMO soybeans are perfect for a variety of culinary uses. Sustainably farmed and rich in protein, they're ideal for healthy living.

data.name: Yellow Corn
data.description: Discover the vibrant taste of our yellow corn, sourced from premier plantations worldwide! We ensure top-quality kernels at every step of the supply chain, from field to table. Experience the golden goodness and support sustainable farming practices.

data.name: Iustus Agricultura Uganda PLC
data.description: The Uganda Refinery Project 2026 represents a major strategic expansion into local value creation across East African markets. Construction will commence in 2026 on a 20-30 acre site in Bugembe District, Eastern Uganda, with expected completion by 2028. The facility will prepare 250 square miles of sugarcane plantation, aligning with our 'Just Trade' commitment by boosting local economic engagement and creating sustainable jobs.

data.name: Iustus Agricultura Brazil SA
data.description: This ambitious project involves the planned acquisition of two or three major refining assets in Brazil, strategically integrated with securing sufficient land for self-sufficient cultivation of sugarcane. By gaining full control of the process—from planting and cultivation through to final refining—we ensure unmatched traceability and enforce our rigorous ethical and environmental standards directly at the source.

data.name: Iustus Mercatura Finance DIFC LLC
data.description: The establishment of Iustus Mercatura Finance DIFC LLC in Dubai International Financial Centre represents a strategic expansion of our 'Just Trade' philosophy into the financial sector. This entity will operate as a full-service financial provider dedicated to supporting ethical growth, focusing on specialized Sustainable Farming and Trade Finance solutions with competitive rates for qualified global clients.
